EmailTemplate.name: Case: SF User Removed
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.New_User_Name__c}'s SF Account has been Deactivated
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
{!Case.New_User_Name__c} has been removed from SF (as well as any other applications that had been assigned) as of {!Case.ClosedDate}.
If other applications were used they are listed below: {!Case.Integrated_Applications__c}
Thank you, Your Salesforce Team
